parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the lower ball joint can cause loss of steering, leading to accidents or loss of control of the vehicle.
symptoms: Sudden loss of power steering assist
lower ball joint separation from the lower control arm

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the hood supports can cause the hood to crash down, resulting in injuries to the head, wrists, and fingers, and potentially leading to serious consequences, including death.
symptoms: The hood props do not support the hood lid when opened
the hood slowly settles on the head or body while working under the hood.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the window regulator can cause the window to malfunction, leading to difficulty or inability to operate the window, which can be a safety concern, especially in emergency situations.
symptoms: The window does not move up or down
the window is stuck in a certain position
the cable is visible and coming out of the envelope
the envelope or tubing is cracked or broken
the window regulator makes a loud noise or grinding sound when operating.
